feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission clearly describes a working financial application: it computes commissions, handles multi-currency conversion, applies discount penalties, and provides optimization output and templates. The Implement and Reflect stages provide concrete functional details and an example scenario, meeting the thoroughness required for PASS.
- Integrate AI: The submission describes concrete AI functions (NL input parsing, data extraction, currency conversion, commission math) and value-added features (cliff detection, optimization strategies, email templates), showing effective integration rather than superficial use. Discover/Implement/Reflect statements collectively demonstrate a strong, applied AI integration.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "So this is why today I built an AI-powered sales commission optimizer."
"The a- A.I. instantly will extract the data, fetch the currency rates, and kind of run the commission math."

"The work flow processes everything in seconds, um, natural language input, multi-currentcy expense conversion, um, commission calculations. With discount penalties and personalized coaching and all through kind of that simple interface."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover (scenario motivating a financial tool), Implement (descriptions of data extraction, currency rates, executing commission math and workflow), Reflect (statements about dollar impact and empowering sales decisions) â€” these stages together show the tool was designed, implemented, and evaluated as a financial application.
criteria.reasoning: The submission clearly describes a working financial application: it computes commissions, handles multi-currency conversion, applies discount penalties, and provides optimization output and templates. The Implement and Reflect stages provide concrete functional details and an example scenario, meeting the thoroughness required for PASS.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "So this is why today I built an AI-powered sales commission optimizer."
"The A.I. instantly will extract the data, fetch the currency rates, and kind of run the commission math."

"So it identifies when you kind of crossed the commission cliff, if you would, kind of shows you exactly how much money you're leaving on the table, and provide specific optimization strategies for you going forward."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover: framed the real-world sales problem motivating the tool; Implement: described AI extraction, currency fetch, calculation, workflow and outputs; Reflect: explained impact on reps' pay and decision-making, showing value added.
criteria.reasoning: The submission describes concrete AI functions (NL input parsing, data extraction, currency conversion, commission math) and value-added features (cliff detection, optimization strategies, email templates), showing effective integration rather than superficial use. Discover/Implement/Reflect statements collectively demonstrate a strong, applied AI integration.
